Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Finance Tracking Application

Full-stack personal finance tracking application with:
- .NET 8.0 backend with minimal APIs
- React + TypeScript frontend with shadcn/ui
- Docker support for easy deployment
- SQLite and SQL Server database support
- Transaction tracking with categories
- Statistics and visualizations
- Responsive design for mobile and desktop
